ctx: intros A f l a H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A) (x : A), find f l = Some x -> In x l /\\ f x = true" on hypothesis of type "argmax f l = Some a".

ctx: intros A f l a H.
intros A f l a H.
intros A f l a H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros A f l a H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables B, f, b.

ctx: intros A f l a H.
intros A f l a H.

original: intros A f l a H. split. - apply find_some in H. destruct H as [Hin Heq]. apply nth_error_In in Hin. split; auto. - intros x Hinx. apply filterMap_In in Hinx. destruct Hinx as [Hin' Heq']. apply reflect_iff in Heq'. destruct Heq' as [_ Hge]. apply leb_complete in Hge. apply Hge.
